messages.subject: Enjoy Life Unschooling Conference NEW tshirt design posted on the 	website
messages.msgSnippet: We have put up a picture of the t shirt. I LOVE IT! It is a gorgeous terracotta on a sage t shirt. It says Enjoy Life Unschooling and had a catchy graphic of a
messages.messageBody:
We have put up a picture of the t shirt. I LOVE IT! It is a gorgeous
terracotta on a sage t shirt. It says Enjoy Life Unschooling and had a
catchy graphic of a child at play. The sleeve has the conference
information. They will be amazing. I can't wait to get one :-)

http://enjoylifeunschooling.com/registration/

ALSO registration is still going. Our spaces are limited and we are closing
in on capacity!!! There are 8 days left for the GENERAL registration after
that we stop taking T shirt orders and the conference fees go up. Reserve
your space while we still have some available. And save some money. You can
order a shirt on its own if you can't come :-( They are worth wearing around
town flying your freak flag!

I can't wait to meet everyone who is coming. I will be sure to come say HI!

Faith

--
http://faithvoid.blogspot.com/
www.bearthmama.com
